document_data.name: Nathyrra
document_data.alignment3e: [[Lawful evil]]<ref group="note">It should be noted that, although Nathyrra is technically of the [[lawful evil]] alignment, she behaves as if she were good-aligned. This indicates that she is only lawful evil for the purposes of game mechanics, as the [[assassin]] class is evil-restricted.
document_data.mainbody:
'''Nathyrra''' was a former member of the [[Red Sisters]] order of [[drow]] assassins and later a devout follower of [[Eilistraee]].

She was first met by [[Drogan Droganson's pupil|Drogan's Pupil]] in the bowels of [[Undermountain]], offering assistance in freeing [[Halaster Blackcloak]].
